name: 鄭國忠
objective: 本課程說明如何利用質量及動量守恆建立可以描述速度、應力及壓力等流體系統物理量間關係之統制方程式。其內容包括：線及角動量守衡、應力張量、平滑近似理論、非穩態流動、邊界層近似法、線性穩定度理論及紊流系統。
schedule:
Weeks 1-2
Viscosity and the stress (momentum flux) tensor
Weeks 3-4
Shell momentum balances and velocity distributions
Weeks 5-7
Quiz 1
Equations of change and their use [isothermal]
Weeks 8
Momentum transport with two independent variables
Week 9
Mid-Exam.
Weeks 10-11
Momentum transport with two independent variables
Weeks 12-13
Friction factors; use of empirical correlations
Weeks 14-16
Quiz 2
Macroscopic balances [isothermal]
Week 17
Momentum transport in polymeric liquids
Week 18
Final-Exam.
scorePolicy:
Quiz+Mid-exam: 10+20
Quiz+Final-exam: 10+30
Class Attendance and Homework: 30- 
Max.:100
materials:
R. B. Bird, W. E. Stewart and E. N. Lightfoot,
 Transport Phenomena, 
2nd Ed., John Wiley & Sons, Inc., 2002.
